briefTitle: Open-label Study of Adalimumab in Japanese Subjects With Hidradenitis Suppurativa
officialTitle: A Phase 3 Multicenter, Open-label, Single Arm Study of the Safety and Efficacy of Adalimumab in Japanese Subjects With Moderate to Severe Hidradenitis Suppurativa
summary: This study investigates efficacy, safety and pharmacokinetics of adalimumab in Japanese subjects with moderate to severe hidradenitis suppurativa (HS).

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Achieving Hidradenitis Suppurativa Clinical Response (HiSCR) at Week 12
